summary:
A mod aiming to make the dark brotherhood a bit more rewarding by giving all the unenchanted one of a kind items some enchantments

Eine Mod, die die Dunkle Bruderschaft lohnender macht, indem sie allen unverzauberten nicht-einzigartigen Gegenst채nden Verzauberungen hinzuf체gt.
descriptionHtml:
hi this mod will make the dark brotherhood a bit more rewarding by giving some enchantments to all the unenchanted one of a kind items in the questline 

Eine Mod, die die Dunkle Bruderschaft lohnender macht, indem sie allen unverzauberten nicht-einzigartigen Gegenst채nden Verzauberungen hinzuf체gt.



Changelog

V.1
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Mod Start Up
Added \"Light Of The Emperor\" enchantment to emperors robes it gives  the user 50 magica 25 hp 150% magica restore and makes destruction and cunjuration cost 75% less to cast
I know that this is over powered but belive me i will downgrade this alot and also make diffrent rates

v2
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
changed \"light of the emperor\" to \"light of the emperor mage high\" only a namechange

Added \"light of the emperor mage medium\"
same as \"light of the emperor mage high but just with much lower stats making this an actually fair item\"

added \"light of the emperor mage low\"
again same as above just with lower stats

added \"light of the emperor speech\" high, medium and low
this is an alternate one that instaed of making it a mage robe gives it bunuses to all speech realted things and agin high is op medium is a bit over the normal and low is not unbalancing anything

v3
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
added the \"the pig children 1h skill book

makes the book found on grelods body give on lvl in 1 handed

v3.5
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
added Ciceros journals gives sneak lvl 
does what its named ciceros five journals now gives a total of 5 sneak lvls
added uncommon taste - signed now an aclhemy skillbook
again just makes a book give a skll
